column2: "Na da a odzi dapɛn no kan no
column3: anapaatu no na mbaa no dze nduhuam a wosiesiei no kɔr nda no do."

column2: "Na wokohun ɔbo no dɛ woepirew no efi nda no abowano."
"Na wɔhɛɛn mu no
column3: woennhu Ewuradze Jesus no fun."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ iyi yɛɛ hɔn adwen mu basabasa no
column3: hwɛ
column4: mbarimba beenu begyinaa hɔn nkyɛn a wɔhyɛ ntar hyɛnhyɛn;"

column2: "na hu kaa hɔn
column3: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn enyi adze sensɛɛn famu no
column4: wɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom rohwehwɛ nyia ɔtse ase no wɔ ewufo mu yi?"

column2: "Onnyi ha
column3: na ɔasoɛr: hom nkaa mbrɛ ɔda ho wɔ Galilii no
column4: ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hom dɛ"

column2: "ɔsɛ nyimpa Ba no dɛ wobeyi no ahyɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo nsa na wɔabɔ no mbeamudua mu na da a otsia ebiasa no ɔasoɛr bio no."
"Na wɔkaa ne nsɛm no
column4: "na wofii nda no do sanee bɛkaa ndzɛmba yi nyina kyerɛɛ dubiako no

column2: "Mary Magdalene nye Joana nye James ne na Mary
column3: nye mbaa nkaa a wɔka hɔn ho no na wɔbɛkaa nsɛm yinom kyerɛɛ asomafo no."

column2: "Na nsɛm yi yɛɛ hɔn dɛ nsɛnhun
column3: na wɔanngye hɔn enndzi."

column2: "Na Peter dze
column3: ɔsoɛree tutuu mbirika kɔr nda no do
column4: na ɔbɔɔ no mu adze no
column5: ohun dɛ ndwera atam no nko gugu hɔ; na ɔsanee kɔr ne fie
column6: na dza esi no yɛɛ no nwanwa."
column7: "#24.12 Tsetse akyerɛwfo binom mmfa nkyekyɛmu 12 yi nnka ho."

column2: "Na hwɛ
column3: da no ara
column4: hɔn mu beenu sii mu kɔr ekuroba bi a ne dzin dze Emmaus a ofi Jerusalɛm kɔ hɔ bɛyɛ akwansimba eduosia mu."

column2: "Nna woridzi nsɛm a aba yi nyina ho nkɔmbɔ."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: woridzi nkɔmbɔ na woribisabisa hɔnho nsɛm no
column4: Jesus nankasa twee bɛɛn hɔn nye hɔn siaan anan kɔree."

column2: "Naaso wosuoo hɔn enyiwa mu
column3: ma woennhu ne nyimpa ban."

column2: "Na obisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ebɛn nsɛm nye yi a hom dze ridzi nkɔmbɔ nam yi? Na wogyinae a hɔn werɛ ahow."

column2: "Na hɔn mu baako a ne dzin dze Kleopas see no dɛ
column3: Ana ɔwo nko na eyɛ hɔho wɔ Jerusalɛm
column4: ma innyim dza ɔaba nda yi mu yi?"

column2: "Na obisaa hɔn dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze a?  Na wɔsee no dɛ
column4: Dza ɔfa Jesus Nazarɛtnyi a ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi tumfo wɔ ndzeyɛɛ nye kasa mu wɔ Nyankopɔn nye ɔman nyina enyim no ho:"

column2: "mbrɛ asɔfompanyin nye hɛn mpanyimfo no yii no maa dɛ wombu no fɔ nku no
column3: na wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu."

column2: "Na hɛn dze
column3: hɛn enyi daa kwan dɛ nkyɛ ɔno nye nyia ɔrebɛgye Israel. Na iyi nyina ekyir so
column4: wɔyɛɛ ndzɛmba yi ndaansa nye ndɛ."

column2: "Na mbaa bi so a wofi hɛn mu a wɔkɔr nda no do anapahema abɛma hɛn ho abow hɛn;"
"wɔbae bɛkaa dɛ woennhu no fun no
column3: mbom woehu abɔfo bi wɔ enyido adzehu mu so a wɔkaa dɛ ɔtse ase."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔnye hɛn wɔ hɔ binom kɔr nda no do
column3: na wokohun dɛ mbrɛ mbaa no so kae no ara
column4: naaso ɔno dze

column2: "Na ɔnoara see hɔn dɛ
column3: Ao hom a hom adwen mu nndɔ na hom yɛ nyaa wɔ hom akoma mu dɛ hom bɛgye dza nkɔnhyɛfo no kae no nyina edzi!"

column2: "Ana ɔnnsɛ Kraest no dɛ obohu dɛm amandze na ɔakɔ n’enyimnyam mu?"
"Na ɔhyɛɛ ase fi Moses nye nkɔnhyɛfo no nyina do kyerɛɛ hɔn nkyerɛw nyina mu dza ɔfa no ho no ase."
"Na wɔbɛɛn ekuroba a wɔrokɔ mu no
column3: nna ɔyɛɛ dɛ dza ɔrokɔ n’enyim."

column2: "Na wɔhyɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Nye hɛn ntsena
column4: na orudu ewimbir
column5: na adze reyɛ asa. Na ɔmanee dɛ ɔnye hɔn bɛtsena."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ɔnye hɔn tse edzidzii no
column3: ɔfaa paanoo
column4: na ohyiraa do

column2: "Na hɔn enyiwa buei ma wohun no
column3: na ɔyeew hɔn enyiwa do."

column2: "Na wɔsesee hɔnho dɛ
column3: Ɔnye hɛn rekasa wɔ kwan mu
column4: na obuee kyerɛwnsɛm no mu kyerɛɛ hɛn no
column5: aso hɛn akoma anndzɛw hɛn mu dɛɛdɛɛw?"

column2: "Na wɔsoɛɛr dɔn no ara mu sanee baa Jerusalɛm
column3: na wobohun dubiako no nye hɔn a wɔka hɔn ho no dɛ wɔaboa hɔn ano

column2: "Na hɔn so wɔkaa dza ɔbaa kwan no mu
column3: na mbrɛ wohun no wɔ paanoo bu mu no kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔrekasa dɛm no
column3: Jesus nankasa begyinaa hɔn finimfin
column4: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ

column2: "Na wɔbobɔɔ piriw na hu kaa hɔn
column3: na wosusuu dɛ woehu ɔsaman."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn na hom akoma etutu yi? Na ebɛnadze ntsi na adwendwen soɛrsoɛr hom akoma mu yi?"

column2: "Hom nhwɛ me nsa nye me nan dɛ emi mankasa a: hom nka me nhwɛ; na ɔsaman nnyi honam nye mbiew dɛ mbrɛ hom hu dɛ mowɔ yi."
"Na ɔsee dɛm no
column3: ɔdze ne nsa nye ne nan kyerɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Nna wɔda ho nngye nndzi wɔ dɛw ntsi
column3: na ɔyɛ hɔn nwanwa no
column4: ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: Ana hom wɔ edziban bi wɔ ha?"

column2: "Na wɔmaa no esunam a wɔatoto sin."
"Na ɔgyee na odzii wɔ hɔn enyim."
"Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Iyi nye me nsɛm a meda ho wɔ hom nkyɛn no mekaa kyerɛɛ hom dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ mo ho wɔ Moses mbra
column4: nye nkɔnhyɛfo
column5: nye ndwom no mu nyina bɛba mu."

column2: "Nna obuee hɔn adwen mu
column3: ama wɔaatse kyerɛwnsɛm no ase;"

column2: "na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Dɛmara na wɔakyerɛw no
column4: dɛ Kraest no bohu amandze na da a otsia ebiasa no ɔasoɛr efi ewufo mu;"

column2: "na woedua ne dzin do akɛka nnuho nye bɔnfakyɛ akyerɛ amanaman nyina
column3: wobefitsi ase wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Hom yɛ yinom ho adasefo."
"Na hwɛ
column3: morosoma m’Egya n’anohoba maba hom do: na hom ntsena kurow no mu nkodu dɛ wobefi sor abrɛ hom ahoɔdzen."
column4: "#Ndwu 1.4"

column2: "Na ɔdze hɔn fiir edzi kodur Bɛtani tsentsendo
column3: na ɔmaa ne nsa do hyiraa hɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: orihyira hɔn no
column4: ɔnye hɔn paapaa mu na wɔfaa no kɔr sor."

column2: "Na hɔn dze
column3: wɔkotowee sɔɔr no
column4: na wɔdze dɛw kɛse sanee baa Jerusalɛm;"

column2: "na wɔtsenaa asɔrfi mu hɔ daa yii Nyankopɔn ayɛw."
